name: XPayPro.Tech
description: A simple and highly secure way for Anonymous Crypto Payments and Send/Receive/Request Crypto Online. Freelancers, Marketers and Everyone, get paid faster with XPay Pro Invoices. You can create invoices and accept payment from clients with crypto with super low fees anytime, anywhere with a single click. There are two options to setup payment requests and invoices: Anonymous or Normal XPay Pro Tech is a fast and secure service that lets you request and transfer crypto online using a computer or smartphone with our app and your own wallet.
